alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 12:30PM EDT until April 02 at 9:43AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford. White River at Anderson. .Rainfall of 2 to nearly 5 inches over the last 72 hours has resulted in widespread lowland flooding along area waterways. Water will continue to steadily rise on main stem rivers in many locations, remaining above flood stage for the next several days. Lowland flooding primarily impacts agricultural land along with local river roads and parks. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SUNDAY NIGHT TO SUNDAY, APRIL 02... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork White River near Bedford. * WHEN...From late Sunday night to Sunday, April 02. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Limited parking at Bedford Boat Club. Flood waters cover much of the parking lot and are too deep to drive in. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Saturday the stage was 17.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Monday morning to a crest of 24.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated by 10 PM EDT.
